participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a yearning for adventure and a bit of mischief.
participant_1.background: i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i'm a 56 year old woman. i have two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i fantasize about taking over the world.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, with a passion for animals and a love of sports.
participant_2.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. i have three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics.

content.text: hello, how are you? I am 56 years old. what do you do?
